SELECT SEQ_ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL ( NO, DRAFTER, CATEGORY_NO, REQUEST_DATE, TITLE ) VALUES ( #{no}, #{drafter}, #{categoryNo}, SYSDATE, #{title} )
INSERT INTO LETTER_OF_APPROVAL ( NO, APPROVAL_NO, CONTENT, INSTRUCTION ) VALUES ( SEQ_LETTER_OF_APPROVAL.NEXTVAL, #{approvalNo}, #{content}, null )
mapper.select: SELECT EA.NO, DRAFTER, U.NAME AS DRAFTER_NAME, CATEGORY_NO, AC.CATEGORY AS CATEGORY_NAME, REQUEST_DATE, TITLE FROM ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL EA JOIN "USER" U ON EA.DRAFTER = U.NO JOIN APPROVAL_CATEGORY AC ON EA.CATEGORY_NO = AC.NO WHERE EA.NO IN ( SELECT APPROVAL_NO FROM APPROVER WHERE APPROVER_NO = #{userNo} )
SELECT EA.NO, DRAFTER, CATEGORY_NO, REQUEST_DATE, TITLE, CATEGORY AS CATEGORY_NAME, FORM FROM ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL EA JOIN APPROVAL_CATEGORY AC ON EA.CATEGORY_NO = AC.NO WHERE EA.NO = #{no}

SELECT NAME, B.D_NAME1, B.D_NAME2, B.D_NAME3, B.D_NAME4, TO_CHAR(REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD (DAY)') AS DRAFTER_DATE, EA.NO AS EA_NO FROM "USER" U JOIN ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL EA ON U.NO = EA.DRAFTER JOIN ( SELECT D.NO AS TOP_MOST_NO, A.NAME AS D_NAME1, B.NAME AS D_NAME2, C.NAME AS D_NAME3, D.NAME AS D_NAME4 FROM DEPARTMENT A RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON A.NO = B.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON B.NO = C.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.NO = D.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO ) B ON U.DEPARTMENT_NO = B.TOP_MOST_NO WHERE EA.NO = #{no}
